title: Create Patient-Facing Educational Material
description: A medical communications specialist needs to create a patient-friendly brochure explaining a specific disease state.

tasks.description: Research and summarize the key information about the disease state in plain language.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a summary avoiding medical jargon.

tasks.description: Draft the content for the brochure using the summary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the full text for the brochure.

tasks.description: Submit the draft brochure for internal medical and regulatory review to ensure accuracy and compliance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the document to the promotional review committee.
